@@ -351,13 +351,13 @@ SELECT f1 - date '2000-01-01' AS `Days From 2K` FROM DATE_TBL;

comments.body:
~If you want to keep this as a comment. You need to add JIRA issue above this line. The following is the PostgreSQL result.~
```
select make_time(8, 20, 0.0);
 make_time 
-----------
 08:20:00
(1 row)
```
Oops. Please ignore the above. It's `make_time`. I was confused.
Spark doesn't support the `TIME` type for now. Are we going to reach parity to PostgreSQL and support it. If so, I could open JIRA for that.
Please add a comment with `SPARK-28471` before line 354.
